column5: Start Date: OctoberIn a world with an increasingly global workforce, those working in human resource management (HRM) need to understand the transnational nature of employees in the 21st century. Companies need to work harder to provide a competitive employment package to attract and retain the best workers, and HRM professionals need to be able to adapt their approach to individual employees and situations.
